org.lightsleep.connection

Interface ConnectionSupplier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<ConnectionWrapper>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnectionSupplier, C3p0, Dbcp, HikariCP, Jdbc, Jndi, TomcatCP

    public interface ConnectionSupplier
extends java.util.function.Supplier<ConnectionWrapper>
    The interface of the supplier of the connection wrappers.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo

    • Method Summary

      • find

        static ConnectionSupplier find(java.lang.String... urlWords)
        Finds the ConnectionSupplier object related to the url containing all the words of the specified urlWords.
        Parameters:
        urlWords - words in url
        Returns:
        the found ConnectionSupplier object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ConnectionSupplier object can not be found or multiple found
        Since:
        2.1.0
